key_points: Gabby Petito, a 22-year-old woman from Long Island, has gone missing during a cross-country trip with her boyfriend.
She was last known to be in Wyoming's Grand Teton National Park in late August.
The vehicle, a white 2012 Ford Transit van with Florida plates, has been recovered.
Boyfriend Brian Laundrie has returned to Florida, hired an attorney, and is not cooperating with authorities.
Gabby's mother, Nicole Schmidt, reported her missing and mentioned uncertain communication towards the end of August.
Gabby's father, Joe Petito, expresses the distress and helplessness the family is facing.
The couple documented their journey on Instagram and a YouTube channel, showcasing their adventurous lifestyle.
Authorities and Petito's family are seeking public assistance to find her.
A GoFundMe page has been set up to support the search and investigation expenses.
Petito is described as 5 feet 5, blond with blue eyes, having distinctive tattoos and a belly button piercing.
